content: e amanda hat by gina house a fantastically soft and universally attractive hat warm cozy and wonderful for the winter the amanda hat gina house/sleepy eyes knits copyright © 2007 updated june 2012 1 what y ll need needle us 9 5 5 mm 16 40 6 cm and 40 101 6 cm circular or set of dpns yarn 110 yards 100 5 m of a soft single ply heavy worsted weight merino wool yarn i used 1/2 skein of malabrigo worsted colorway jacinto ** notions stitch marker scissors tapestry needle measuring tape finished dimensions 8 20 3 cm cast on to crown by 10 75 27 3 cm across widest part of hat this size fits a women s head approximately 20-22 50 8-55 9 cm around gauge 4 sts and 5 row = 1 inch 2 5 cm in stockinette directions cast on 83 stitches loosely being careful not to twist join in the round and place a marker to indicate the beginning of the round the amanda hat gina house/sleepy eyes knits copyright © 2007 updated june 2012 2 1 garter ribbing approx 1 5 /3 8 cm round 1 purl round 2 knit repeat rounds 1 and 2 three more times a total of 8 rounds 2 body of hat approx 5 /12 7 cm follow the background lace pattern see background lace chart for 12 rounds 3 repeats repeat garter ribbing two times 4 rounds follow the background lace pattern for 12 rounds 3 repeats repeat garter ribbing two times 4 rounds 3 crown decreases approx 2 5 /6 4 cm round 1 k5 k2tog around to last 6 sts k6 round 2 and all even rounds knit round 3 k4 k2tog around round 5 k3 k2tog around round 7 k2 k2tog around round 9 k1 k2tog around round 11 k2tog around round 12 knit cut yarn leaving a 6 tail pull through your last stitch and weave in the ends on the wrong side of the hat and yes there is supposed to be a line to show where the back of the hat is d note this hat is a bit deep for greater warmth and wearability - and also to cover the ears if you find this hat to be too deep for your head complete only 2 out of the 3 repeats of the lace background pattern between the garter ridges or leave out the second set 4 rounds of garter stitch after the second set of pattern rounds of hat some knitters have also opted to do a bit more decreasing at the top of the head you can continue with the decreases as established until you have the desired amount of stitches left on the needle before ending if you wish to make a child s size download my free baby amanda hat pattern available on ravelry or my website see last page of pattern for more details also join the amanda hat mania or sleepyheads group on ravelry
